text:
Ant is set up to use javac by default, but the new RPMs install a config file,
/etc/ant.conf, that has the line 

# Use Jikes
usejikes=true

Please just comment this out in the standard install, with a note about where it
gets used. Answering emails about it and other details of the new configuration
have kept me busy all morning.

Thanks,

Dave
creator: dfw1@cornell.edu
hgomez@slib.fr
text: fixed in -4 rpm release, just released ;)
we no longer provide RPMs, so it is time to close the component as it only causes confusion.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
